LanguageData.BuildDP12.label: Build DP-12 Double-barreled Pumpshotgun
LanguageData.BuildDP12.description: Build the DP-12 Double-barreled Pumpshotgun for double the fun... And double the cost.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildCAWS.label: Build CAWS
LanguageData.BuildCAWS.description: Build the CAWS, no longer a prototype.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildSSS.label: Build Serbu Super Shorty
LanguageData.BuildSSS.description: Build the Serbu Super Shorty, something between a common pistol and a pocket handcannon.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildPa_W1887L.label: Build Winchester Model 1887
LanguageData.BuildPa_W1887L.description: Build the Winchester Model 1887 lever-action shotgun, live your cowboy action shooting dream.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildPa_W1887S.label: Build Winchester Model 1887 "Mare's Leg"
LanguageData.BuildPa_W1887S.description: Build the Winchester Model 1887 "Mare's Leg" lever-action shotgun, "Hasta la vista, Baby".\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildPa_W1897T.label: Build Winchester Model 1897(T)
LanguageData.BuildPa_W1897T.description: Build Winchester Model 1897, Trench Grade pump-action shotgun, the usage of this weapon was almost consider a warcrime during its time.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildPa_W1897L.label: Build Winchester Model 1897(L)
LanguageData.BuildPa_W1897L.description: Build Winchester Model 1897, Standard Grade pump-action shotgun with 30 in barrel, perfect weapon for trap shooting and hunters.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
